title: Ask HN: How to simplify too many dev environments?
text:
I code with vscode on 4 different local machines, using about 20 different ssh connections to cloud vms/containers. Two of the local machines are corporate which I don't have admin access.

Is there a secure solution where I could launch a remote, centralised version of vscode? I used to ssh -X into Sublime to a lan machine which had all my projects but I want to decommission my home server.

Ask HN: Any Cool Mac Touchbar Concepts?
text:
Dear HN,

I have never used the Touchbar and always disliked it immensely. Now that the fest of love is near, I thought, I might be a bit more open, after ignoring and being mean to it for the past 3 years.

Do you know of any creative apps / concepts using the touchbar? They do not have to be useful per se, just a cool idea or concept. Also, if it is not an app, maybe just an idea you had in your mind, I'd like to hear it.

I will be buying a new laptop soon and it will for sure not a have a Touchbar (probably not even a mac). So I'd like to at least check, if I have just a missed a major opportunity to have some fun coming up with creative ideas for it.

The only thing I have seen that I found really, really cool, was the "Samplr Touchbar app": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fMlmzTBF_LE

I found it mentioned here, when searching HN: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25049595

What else is there? Maybe a concept that just didn't work out but was a neat idea?

Don't worry, I am not looking to become a "Touchbar" activist. Just feel there must be something to it, that not even apple could think of, that would be a cool use case. I couldn't find anything online.

title: Show HN: Swipe to clear your camera roll
text:
Cleaning your camera roll is time consuming

Over Thanksgiving weekend, I built Vacuum, a Tinder-like app to clean your camera roll

It works whether you're on the train, plane, or pretending to pay attention in a zoom call

Ask HN: Made it to the HN frontpage?, what was the impact it had?
text:
Recently I had my second HN frontpage with all the perks attached: the huge spike on visits, the exposure on other media, and the peer comments & suggestions.

But since, in both posts I was not selling anything I can't really quantify or put a number on how much impact a HN frontpage could have in other aspects apart from the exposure.

This is a 10 year post from DHH with comments from Pg but I can't find nothing newer https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3680018

Care to share your experience here?
